title: Does Ashe's ability make it so she can't crit??
body:
I just played with an {{champion:22}} , and put two {{item:3031}} on her.  Even though she was bronze, she was still easily doing 400 damage each crit, which was 65% of the time.  When she used her ability, though, her damage output seemed to drop dramatically, and I never saw damage over ~100 at a time.  Her ability simply says her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows, which appear to do a set damage based on her AD, without mentioning that they can still crit.  

Soo... can they still crit?

replies.body: Her damage numbers do go down when she uses her ability but you have to remember that she hits multiple times per shot for an increase in dps at a loss of big numbers.

> [{quoted}](name=AlienPrimate,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=Fk3l67OI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-26T19:39:51.329+0000)
>
> Her damage numbers do go down when she uses her ability but you have to remember that she hits multiple times per shot for an increase in dps at a loss of big numbers.

I recognize that, but I'm not sure if the flurry can crit like a normal auto can.  I wasn't seeing some numbers that were 4x the other numbers, though it was also hard to see, so I could have missed them.

Ashe is a {{item:3087}}  champ. When she shoots the flurry, the items proccs more often than it would for a normal champ... She's on-hit, but she shines on stuff like {{item:3087}} , sword breaker, hush, runaan's, giant's slayer,{{item:3022}} , hand of justice...
Was it against someone with flat damage reduction like Leona?
try it with the jeweled gauntlet and report back :)
